description: Step to remove records from a model, with the option to specify how many records to delete to prevent timeouts or other issues.
label: Delete All Records With Limit

options.name: model
options.label: Model
options.info: The model for which you want to delete all records

options.name: amountToDelete
options.info: When deleting huge ammount of records at once, we will limit the total ammount of records to be deleted to this number
options.label: Limit the number of records to delete

options.name: batchSize
options.info: Deleting records in larger batches will increase performance, however if the batch size is too big it could decrease the amount deleted because it will first initiate a list to delete first
options.label: Batch size in what records will be deleted

options.name: filter
options.label: Filter
options.info: Filter based on Data API filter with variable options.
Variables to be used in the filter option.
options.label: Variables
options.name: filterVars
